## Quarto

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
long_df <- full_df |>
  pivot_longer(
      cols = starts_with("prices"),
      names_to = "age",
      names_prefix = "prices",
      values_to = "price",
      values_drop_na = TRUE
  )
```


```{r}
ggplot(long_df, aes(x = age, y = price, color = type)) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_wrap(~ STATE)
```

The `echo: false` option disables the printing of code (only output is displayed).
